verses.verse: Now <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>purposed<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and a <S%H1004>house<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> counted <S%H5608>out<s%> threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to bear <S%H5449>burdens<s%>, and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> men that were <S%H2672>hewers<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> to oversee <S%H5329>them<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H2361>Huram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, As thou didst <S%H6213>deal<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and didst <S%H7971>send<s%> him <S%H730>cedars<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>therein<s%>, even so deal with me.

Behold <S%H1129><s%>, I am about to build a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> it to <S%H6999>him<s%>, and to burn <S%H6440>before<s%> him <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H8548>spices<s%>, and for the continual <S%H4635>showbread<s%>, and for the <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening<s%>, on the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, and on the new <S%H2320>moons<s%>, and on the set <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>. This is an ordinance for <S%H5769>ever<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I <S%H1129>build<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%>; for <S%H1419>great<s%> is our <S%H430>God<s%> above all <S%H430>gods<s%>.

But who is <S%H6113>able<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> him a <S%H1004>house<s%>, seeing <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> cannot <S%H3557>contain<s%> <S%H1129>him<s%>? who am I then, that I should build him a <S%H1004>house<s%>, save <S%H518>only<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>?

Now therefore <S%H7971>send<s%> me a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2450>skilful<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and in <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and in <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and in <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and in <S%H710>purple<s%>, and <S%H3758>crimson<s%>, and <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and that knoweth how to <S%H6605>grave<s%> all manner of <S%H6605>gravings<s%>, to be with the skilful <S%H2450>men<s%> that are with me in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, whom <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H3559>provide<s%>.

Send <S%H7971><s%> me also <S%H730>cedar-trees<s%>, <S%H6086><s%> <S%H1265>fir-trees<s%>, and <S%H418>algum-trees<s%>, out of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>; for I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>: <S%H5650>and<s%>, behold, my servants shall be with thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>,

even to <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me <S%H6086>timber<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>; for the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I am about to <S%H1129>build<s%> shall be <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6381>wonderful<s%>.

And <S%H5414><s%>, behold, I will give to thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, the <S%H2404>hewers<s%> that <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H4347>beaten<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

Then <S%H2361>Huram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> in <S%H3791>writing<s%>, which he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, Because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H160>loveth<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, he hath <S%H5414>made<s%> thee king over <S%H4428>them<s%>.

Huram <S%H2361><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1288>moreover<s%>, Blessed be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>, who hath <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3045>endued<s%> with <S%H7922>discretion<s%> and <S%H998>understanding<s%>, that should <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and a <S%H1004>house<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>.
And now I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H2450>skilful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H3045>endued<s%> with <S%H998>understanding<s%>, of <S%H2361>Huram<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>'s,

the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>; and his <S%H1>father<s%> was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6876>Tyre<s%>, <S%H3045>skilful<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and in <S%H3701>silver<s%>, in <S%H5178>brass<s%>, in <S%H1270>iron<s%>, in <S%H68>stone<s%>, and in <S%H6086>timber<s%>, in <S%H713>purple<s%>, in <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and in fine <S%H948>linen<s%>, and in <S%H3758>crimson<s%>, also to <S%H6605>grave<s%> any manner of <S%H6603>graving<s%>, and to <S%H2803>devise<s%> any <S%H4284>device<s%>; that there may be a <S%H5414>place<s%> appointed unto him with thy skilful <S%H2450>men<s%>, and with the skilful <S%H2450>men<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>.

Now therefore the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and the <S%H8184>barley<s%>, the <S%H8081>oil<s%> and the <S%H3196>wine<s%>, which my <S%H113>lord<s%> hath <S%H559>spoken<s%> <S%H7971>of<s%>, let him send unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%>:

and we will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> out of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, as much as thou shalt <S%H6878>need<s%>; and we will <S%H935>bring<s%> it to thee in <S%H7513>floats<s%> by <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3305>Joppa<s%>; and thou shalt carry it <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5608>numbered<s%> all the <S%H582>sojourners<s%> that were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H5610>numbering<s%> wherewith <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H5608>numbered<s%> <S%H4672>them<s%>; and they were found a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>set<s%> threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of them to bear <S%H5449>burdens<s%>, and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> that were <S%H2672>hewers<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5329>overseers<s%> to <S%H5647>set<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H5647>work<s%>.
